summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 725 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 775.2m higher than yesterday, 131.9m lower than the past week, 724.5m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 2040m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, a humid atmosphere. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
